#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
/*
* 	find all the prime numbers between two numbers 
*	written by Hariom Singh
*
*/
using namespace std;
void prime(long int a,long int b)
{
	 int sum=0;
	bool prime[b+1];
	memset(prime,true,sizeof(prime));
	for(long int i=2;i*i<=b;i++)
	{
		if(prime[i]==true)
		{
		for(long int j=2*i;j<=b;j=j+i)
		prime[j]=false;
		}
	}
	for(int i=2;i<=b;i++)
	{
		
		if(prime[i]&&i>=a)
			
		sum++;
	}
	
	cout<<sum<<endl;
//	return sum;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long int x,y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		prime(x,y);
	}
	return 0;
}
